mapper.sql: CTM_BAR_CODE, SEND_TIME, BEGIN_CITY, CTM_NAME, PROVINCE, COST_HOUR, TOTAL_SEND, TOTAL_SUCC, TOTAL_SUCC_TIMEOUT, WAIT_COURIER_NUMBER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from REPORT_SIGN
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into REPORT_SIGN (CTM_BAR_CODE, SEND_TIME, BEGIN_CITY, CTM_NAME, PROVINCE, COST_HOUR, TOTAL_SEND, TOTAL_SUCC, TOTAL_SUCC_TIMEOUT, WAIT_COURIER_NUMBER) values (#{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{beginCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalSend,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalSucc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalSuccTimeout,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{waitCourierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into REPORT_SIGN
CTM_BAR_CODE,
SEND_TIME,
BEGIN_CITY,
CTM_NAME,
PROVINCE,
COST_HOUR,
TOTAL_SEND,
TOTAL_SUCC,
TOTAL_SUCC_TIMEOUT,
WAIT_COURIER_NUMBER,

#{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{beginCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{costHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{totalSend,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{totalSucc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{waitCourierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update REPORT_SIGN
CTM_BAR_CODE = #{record.ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_TIME = #{record.sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BEGIN_CITY = #{record.beginCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTM_NAME = #{record.ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{record.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COST_HOUR = #{record.costHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_SEND = #{record.totalSend,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_SUCC = #{record.totalSucc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_SUCC_TIMEOUT = #{record.totalSuccTimeout,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAIT_COURIER_NUMBER = #{record.waitCourierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update REPORT_SIGN set CTM_BAR_CODE = #{record.ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_TIME = #{record.sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BEGIN_CITY = #{record.beginCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_NAME = #{record.ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{record.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COST_HOUR = #{record.costHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_SEND = #{record.totalSend,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_SUCC = #{record.totalSucc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_SUCC_TIMEOUT = #{record.totalSuccTimeout,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WAIT_COURIER_NUMBER = #{record.waitCourierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update REPORT_SIGN
BEGIN_CITY = #{beginCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTM_NAME = #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COST_HOUR = #{costHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_SEND = #{totalSend,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_SUCC = #{totalSucc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_SUCC_TIMEOUT = #{totalSuccTimeout,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAIT_COURIER_NUMBER = #{waitCourierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CTM_BAR_CODE = #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select begin_city, case when sum(total_send) =0 then 0 else sum(total_succ)/sum(total_send) end as ratioSign, case when sum(total_succ) =0 then 0 else sum(total_succ_timeout)/sum(total_succ) end as ratioTimeout from report_sign where send_time >= #{0} and send_time < #{1} group by begin_city
